extendedInfo.description: Stay on top of your finances while away from your computer with Comerica Mobile Banking.  With this free service for Comerica Web BankingÂ® customers you can:Check available balancesView account activityMake transfers between accountsPay Bills (for Comerica Web Bill PayÂ® customers)Find Comerica banking centersFind Comerica ATMsSecurity Comerica is committed to mobile banking security.  To protect your personal information from unauthorized access and use, we use security measures that comply with federal law. These measures include computer safeguards and secured files and buildings.Standard text and data rates may apply. Check with your mobile service provider for details on specific fees and charges. Comerica Mobile Banking is available to Comerica Web Banking customers.Comerica Bank Member FDIC

reviews.title: Unacceptable
reviews.comment: I have both business and personal accounts.   Can only login to one on my phone because it saves the login data of the first one I logged in to.  Should accept multiple logins. Also, I\'m well aware of the fact that I\'m using a non system keyboard.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ok mobile banking app
reviews.comment: pretty much every bank app has the deposit feature, but with this app we can pretty much just check our balances.
reviews.author: Mariam Alsheikhly

reviews.title: Decent, questionable actions
reviews.comment: This works pretty good for basic account info, but not much else. Using it on my S3 with a rooted rom and it is requesting superuser access. It has zero reason to need that. I deny it and it works fine.
reviews.author: Clint Eschberger

reviews.title: Needs to have check deposit
reviews.comment: Almost useless without check deposit feature that every other bank app uses. Ready to switch banks for this feature.
reviews.author: Melanie Watterson

reviews.title: Finally works on ICS
reviews.comment: Pretty good app now. Took you long enough
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No ICS support?!!
reviews.comment: Add ICS support now. Last update to this app was almost a year ago!! ICS has been out for 8 months! Many are already on to the next OS. People are leaving your bank because of this! You may be \"committed to mobile banking security,\" but you are clearly not committed to mobile banking. What a joke!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Asking # permission
reviews.comment: I use a privacy app to deny apps private info, like sim serial, phone number, etc. When denied these permissions, this app requests superuser permissions! Fix this and you may get more stars
reviews.author: Michael Sullinger

reviews.title: Note 2
reviews.comment: I am so happy that Comerica has a banking app. My husband and I use this all the time.
reviews.author: Annette James

reviews.comment: Awful app, Comerica is one of the few banks without a method of deposits. The branches claim they do not believe in technology
reviews.author: Jeffrey Wolf

reviews.title: Ok I guess...
reviews.comment: I would like to be able to deposit my checks by taking a picture of them, but I guess you can\'t have everything.
reviews.author: Thomas Hamm

reviews.title: Outdated UI
reviews.comment: UI update to match Android design guidelines would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Behind the Times
reviews.comment: I know probably some work will be needed,  but if the app could be used to deposit checks to comerica accounts it would be great! And be like every: other good bank app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Having difficulty
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for a while I\'ve not been able to log in yet.
reviews.author: Arnold Williams

reviews.title: Wack
reviews.comment: It\'s ok very simple and basic.  No notifications, no bells and whistles.
reviews.author: William Robinson

reviews.title: Now supports ICS and Jellybean
reviews.comment: Love it. Mobile banking on the go. Wonder if you can do check deposits though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs to change
reviews.comment: Needs to have more than one login
reviews.author: Celeste Lyke

reviews.title: Wish we could deposit checks
reviews.comment: Works fine. I wish we could deposit checks like the other major banking apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has basic functionality.
reviews.comment: Why does this app request root permissions?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally got updated to ICS but...
reviews.comment: Why does the app ask for root access ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: garbage
reviews.comment: wont even open anymore
reviews.author: Sean Djordjeski
